title: Hallucinatory messages
data:
In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, you may encounter some unexpected messages while [hallucinating](/wiki/Hallucinating "Hallucinating"). The following is a comprehensive list of all available **hallucinatory messages**.

All appearances of "\<color>" will be replaced with one of the following| ultraviolet, infrared, bluish-orange, reddish-green, dark white, light black, sky blue-pink, salty, sweet, sour, bitter, striped, spiral, swirly, plaid, checkered, argyle, paisley, blotchy, guernsey-spotted, polka-dotted, square, round, triangular, cabernet, sangria, fuchsia, wisteria, lemon-lime, strawberry-banana, peppermint, romantic, or incandescent. The word "poohbah" also replaces every instance of "[priest](/wiki/Aligned_priest "Aligned priest")".[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Messages](#Messages)
- [2 History](#History)
  - [2.1 Other unused messages](#Other_unused_messages)
- [3 References](#References)

## Messages

- You feel less trippy now.

  Your [confusion](/wiki/Confusion "Confusion") wore off.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

- You feel less wobbly now.

  Your [stunning](/wiki/Stun "Stun") wore off.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

- Oh, bummer! Everything is dark! Help!

  You became blind.[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

- Your vision seems to dim but is happier now.

  As above, while wearing the [Eyes of the Overworld](/wiki/Eyes_of_the_Overworld "Eyes of the Overworld").[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)

- Far out! Everything is all cosmic again!

  Your blindness wore off.[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)

- Your vision seems to brighten but is sadder now.

  As above, while wearing the Eyes of the Overworld.[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)

- As you open the bottle, an enormous \<monster> emerges!

  You quaffed a [milky potion](/wiki/Milky_potion "Milky potion") and a [ghost](/wiki/Ghost "Ghost") appeared.[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

- You have a normal feeling for a moment, then it passes.

  You quaffed a potion with no net effect, or whenever you would have a [strange feeling](/wiki/Beginner "Beginner").[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)

- This tastes like \[watered down] dandelion wine!

  You quaffed a \[diluted] [potion of booze](/wiki/Potion_of_booze "Potion of booze").[\[10\]](#cite_note-10)

- Yecch! This tastes overripe.

  You quaffed a cursed [potion of fruit juice](/wiki/Potion_of_fruit_juice "Potion of fruit juice") or [potion of see invisible](/wiki/Potion_of_see_invisible "Potion of see invisible").[\[11\]](#cite_note-11)

- This tastes like 10% real \[reconstituted] all-natural beverage.

  You quaffed a \[diluted] non-cursed [potion of fruit juice](/wiki/Potion_of_fruit_juice "Potion of fruit juice") or [potion of see invisible](/wiki/Potion_of_see_invisible "Potion of see invisible").[\[12\]](#cite_note-12)

- You are shocked back to your senses!

  You quaffed a [potion of sickness](/wiki/Potion_of_sickness "Potion of sickness") to end hallucination.[\[13\]](#cite_note-13)

- What a trippy feeling!

  You quaffed a [potion of confusion](/wiki/Potion_of_confusion "Potion of confusion").[\[14\]](#cite_note-14)

- This tastes tangy.

  You quaffed a [potion of acid](/wiki/Potion_of_acid "Potion of acid") while acid resistant.[\[15\]](#cite_note-15)

- You feel a little normal.

  You quaffed or were hit by a [potion of polymorph](/wiki/Potion_of_polymorph "Potion of polymorph").[\[16\]](#cite_note-16)

- You sense something nearby.

  You quaffed a [potion of object detection](/wiki/Potion_of_object_detection "Potion of object detection") or cast the [spell of detect treasure](/wiki/Spell_of_detect_treasure "Spell of detect treasure").[\[17\]](#cite_note-17)

- You get the heebie jeebies.

  You quaffed a [potion of monster detection](/wiki/Potion_of_monster_detection "Potion of monster detection") or cast the [spell of detect monsters](/wiki/Spell_of_detect_monsters "Spell of detect monsters") without any monsters on the level, while not a [beginner](/wiki/Beginner "Beginner").[\[18\]](#cite_note-18)

* You hear a voice say, "It's dead, Jim."

  You applied a [stethoscope](/wiki/Stethoscope "Stethoscope") down at a corpse.[\[19\]](#cite_note-19)

* You produce a normal whistling sound.

  You applied a non-cursed (or cursed, half of the time) [magic whistle](/wiki/Magic_whistle "Magic whistle").[\[20\]](#cite_note-20)

* Yow! The mirror stares back!

  You applied a [mirror](/wiki/Mirror "Mirror") to yourself, while polymorphed into a [floating eye](/wiki/Floating_eye "Floating eye").[\[21\]](#cite_note-21)

* You look \<color>.

  You applied a mirror to yourself, while not polymorphed into a floating eye, [umber hulk](/wiki/Umber_hulk "Umber hulk"), or any [V](/wiki/V "V").[\[22\]](#cite_note-22)

* You give the fish a chance to fix their makeup.

  You applied a mirror in a direction while underwater.[\[23\]](#cite_note-23)

* You suddenly feel trippy.

  You became confused via a cursed [unicorn horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn").[\[24\]](#cite_note-24)

* Oh, wow, look at the pretty shards.

  You destroyed a [gem](/wiki/Gem "Gem") by rubbing it against a cursed [touchstone](/wiki/Touchstone "Touchstone") while not blind.[\[25\]](#cite_note-25)

* Oh wow, man: Fractals!

  As above, with a non-cursed [touchstone](/wiki/Touchstone "Touchstone").

- You give yourself a facial.

  You applied a [cream pie](/wiki/Cream_pie "Cream pie").[\[26\]](#cite_note-26)

- Your body takes on a normal transparency…

  You [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") an artifact to become [invisible](/wiki/Invisible "Invisible"), or ate a [ring of invisibility](/wiki/Ring_of_invisibility "Ring of invisibility").[\[27\]](#cite_note-27) [\[28\]](#cite_note-28)

* A normal force teleports you away…

  You were killed by a falling [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge "Drawbridge"), but were [lifesaved](/wiki/Amulet_of_life_saving "Amulet of life saving").[\[29\]](#cite_note-29)

* \<Monster> drinks the \<lava/moat> and disappears.

  A monster was forced into the [moat](/wiki/Moat "Moat")/[lava](/wiki/Lava "Lava") by the drawbridge and died.[\[30\]](#cite_note-30)

* \<Monster> gets into some heavy metal!

  A monster was killed by a destroyed drawbridge.[\[31\]](#cite_note-31)

* All you see is funky \<color> haze.

  You applied an uncharged [crystal ball](/wiki/Crystal_ball "Crystal ball") while not blind.[\[32\]](#cite_note-32)

* Whoa! Psychedelic colors, \<dude/babe>!  
  You grok some groovy globs of incandescent lava.  
  The crystal pulses with sinister \<color> light!  
  You see goldfish swimming above fluorescent rocks.  
  Oh wow\... like a kaleidoscope!  
  You see tiny snowflakes spinning around a miniature farmhouse.

  You successfully applied a charged crystal ball.[\[33\]](#cite_note-33)[\[34\]](#cite_note-34)[\[35\]](#cite_note-35)[\[36\]](#cite_note-36)[\[37\]](#cite_note-37)[\[38\]](#cite_note-38)

- Dude! The living dead!

  You dug up a [grave](/wiki/Grave "Grave"), creating a [zombie](/wiki/Zombie_\(monster_class\) "Zombie (monster class)").[\[39\]](#cite_note-39)

- I want my mummy!

  You dug up a [grave](/wiki/Grave "Grave"), creating a [mummy](/wiki/Mummy "Mummy").[\[40\]](#cite_note-40)

* There is a \<color> flash as \<object> hits the altar.

  You dropped an object that was either cursed or blessed on an [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar").[\[41\]](#cite_note-41)

- Whoa! Everything looks different.  
  You are surrounded by twisty little passages, all alike.  
  Gee, this looks like uncle Conan's place…

  You arrive on a level you forgot due to [amnesia](/wiki/Amnesia "Amnesia").[\[42\]](#cite_note-42)

- Whoa! Everything seems different.  
  Gee, this seems like uncle Conan's place…

  As above, while blind.

* You feel bummed for a moment.

  Your pet starved.[\[43\]](#cite_note-43)

* You can't kick something that's in a tizzy!

  You attempted to kick something in a [pit](/wiki/Pit "Pit"), [spiked pit](/wiki/Spiked_pit "Spiked pit") or web.[\[44\]](#cite_note-44)

* You would never recognize it anyway.

  You attempted to [call](/wiki/Call "Call") a monster something.[\[45\]](#cite_note-45)

* My brain hurts!

  You put on a [dunce cap](/wiki/Dunce_cap "Dunce cap") or [helm of opposite alignment](/wiki/Helm_of_opposite_alignment "Helm of opposite alignment").[\[46\]](#cite_note-46)

* What a pity - you just ruined a future piece of \[fine] art!

  You cured yourself of petrification; the message will say "fine art" if your [charisma](/wiki/Charisma "Charisma") is over 15.[\[47\]](#cite_note-47)

- You be chillin'.

  You gained [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance").[\[48\]](#cite_note-48)

- You feel totally together, man.

  You gained [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance").[\[49\]](#cite_note-49)

- You feel grounded in reality.

  You gained [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance").[\[50\]](#cite_note-50)

- You feel diffuse.

  You gained [teleportitis](/wiki/Teleportitis "Teleportitis").[\[51\]](#cite_note-51)

- You feel centered in your personal space.

  You gained [teleport control](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control").[\[52\]](#cite_note-52)

- You feel in touch with the cosmos.

  You gained [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy").[\[53\]](#cite_note-53)

- You tawt you taw a puttie tat!

  You lost [see invisible](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").[\[54\]](#cite_note-54)

* You can't resist the temptation to mimic an orange.

  You ate a [mimic](/wiki/Mimic "Mimic") corpse.[\[55\]](#cite_note-55)

* You suddenly dread being peeled and mimic \<race> again.

  Your [mimicking](/wiki/Mimic "Mimic") timeout ended.[\[56\]](#cite_note-56)

* You feel rather trippy.

  You became confused via eating rotten food.[\[57\]](#cite_note-57)

* Oh wow, like, superior, man!

  You ate a [food ration](/wiki/Food_ration "Food ration") while hungry or worse.[\[58\]](#cite_note-58)

* Tastes great! Less filling!

  You ate a [tripe ration](/wiki/Tripe_ration "Tripe ration") while an orc.[\[59\]](#cite_note-59)

* My, that was a primo \<fruit>!

  You ate a non-cursed [slime mold](/wiki/Slime_mold "Slime mold").[\[60\]](#cite_note-60)

* Segmentation fault -- core dumped.  
  Bus error -- core dumped.  
  Yo' mama -- core dumped.

  You ate an [apple](/wiki/Apple "Apple") or [pear](/wiki/Pear "Pear").[\[61\]](#cite_note-61)[\[62\]](#cite_note-62)[\[63\]](#cite_note-63)

* This \<food> is grody!

  You ate a food that would have tasted terrible.[\[64\]](#cite_note-64)

* This \<food> is gnarly!

  You ate a food that would have tasted delicious.[\[65\]](#cite_note-65)

* Four out of five dentists agree.

  You ate a non-cursed [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident").[\[66\]](#cite_note-66)

* You are getting the munchies.

  You became hungry.[\[67\]](#cite_note-67)

* You now have a lesser case of the munchies.

  You ate and are now only [hungry](/wiki/Hungry "Hungry").[\[68\]](#cite_note-68)

* The munchies are interfering with your motor capabilities.

  You became weak from hunger.[\[69\]](#cite_note-69)

* You still have the munchies.

  You ate and are now only [weak](/wiki/Weak "Weak").[\[70\]](#cite_note-70)

- From the murky drain, a hand reaches up… --oops--

  One effect of quaffing from a [sink](/wiki/Sink "Sink")[\[71\]](#cite_note-71)

- You've fallen, and you can't get up.

  You are trapped in a (spiked) [pit](/wiki/Pit "Pit").[\[72\]](#cite_note-72)

- You have an out-of-body experience.

  A monster cast [touch of death](/wiki/Touch_of_death "Touch of death") on you.[\[73\]](#cite_note-73)

- You feel (trippy/trippier)!

  You became confused from a monster spell.[\[74\]](#cite_note-74)

- Ouch! You've been slimed!

  You were hit by an [acid](/wiki/Acid "Acid") attack.[\[75\]](#cite_note-75)

* Whoopsie-daisy!

  You killed a [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") leader or a [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian").[\[76\]](#cite_note-76)

* You hear the studio audience applaud!

  You killed your pet.[\[77\]](#cite_note-77)

* As \<monster> opens the bottle, an enormous \<monster> emerges!

  A ghost generated from a monster quaffing a milky potion.[\[78\]](#cite_note-78)

* \<monster>'s body takes on a normal transparency.

  A monster became [invisible](/wiki/Invisible "Invisible").[\[79\]](#cite_note-79)

* What a pity - \<monster> just ruined a future piece of art!

  A monster cured its stoning.[\[80\]](#cite_note-80)

* (paranoid delusion)

  You viewed a monster that you are warned of via [far look](/wiki/Far_look "Far look").[\[81\]](#cite_note-81)

* The \<monster> inside the box is dead!

  You opened a box containing [Schroedinger's Cat](/wiki/Schroedinger%27s_Cat "Schroedinger's Cat").[\[82\]](#cite_note-82)

* Far out, man! You can see right through yourself.

  You became invisible while you had [see invisible](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").[\[83\]](#cite_note-83)

* Far out, man! You can't see yourself.

  As above, without see invisible.[\[84\]](#cite_note-84)

- There's a tiger in your tank.

  Through [prayer](/wiki/Prayer "Prayer"), you regained lost [attribute](/wiki/Attribute "Attribute") points.[\[85\]](#cite_note-85)

- Looks like you are back in Kansas.

  Through [prayer](/wiki/Prayer "Prayer"), you ended [hallucination](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination").[\[86\]](#cite_note-86)

- You feel that \<god> is bummed.

  A god [smote](/wiki/Smiting "Smiting") you.[\[87\]](#cite_note-87)

- You feel that \<god> is pleased as punch.

  You prayed successfully with a devout [alignment record](/wiki/Alignment_record "Alignment record").[\[88\]](#cite_note-88)

- You feel that \<god> is ticklish.

  As above, with strident alignment record.[\[89\]](#cite_note-89)

- You feel that \<god> is full.

  As above, with other levels of positive alignment record.[\[90\]](#cite_note-90)

* Your sacrifice sprouts wings and a propeller and roars away!  
  Your sacrifice puffs up, swelling bigger and bigger, and pops!  
  Your sacrifice collapses into a cloud of dancing particles and fades away!

  You sacrificed.[\[91\]](#cite_note-91)[\[92\]](#cite_note-92)[\[93\]](#cite_note-93)

* You feel homesick.

  You attempted to offer the [Amulet of Yendor](/wiki/Amulet_of_Yendor "Amulet of Yendor") before reaching the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane").[\[94\]](#cite_note-94)

* You realize you have made a boo-boo.

  You attempted to offer an unidentified [cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor](/wiki/Cheap_plastic_imitation_of_the_Amulet_of_Yendor "Cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor").[\[95\]](#cite_note-95)

* \<God> seems groovy.

  After sacrifice, your god is less angry.[\[96\]](#cite_note-96)

* \<God> seems cosmic (not a new fact).

  After sacrifice, your god is no longer angry.[\[97\]](#cite_note-97)

* The gods seem tall.

  Your sacrifice did nothing to appease your god's anger.[\[98\]](#cite_note-98)

* You realize the gods are not like you and I.

  Your sacrifice reduced your [prayer timeout](/wiki/Prayer_timeout "Prayer timeout"), but it is still nonzero.[\[99\]](#cite_note-99)

* Overall, there is a smell of fried onions.

  Your sacrifice reduced your [prayer timeout](/wiki/Prayer_timeout "Prayer timeout") to zero.[\[100\]](#cite_note-100)

* You see crabgrass at your \<feet>. A funny thing in a dungeon.

  Your sacrifice increased your [Luck](/wiki/Luck "Luck").[\[101\]](#cite_note-101)

- Being so trippy, you screw up…

  You read a scroll while confused.[\[102\]](#cite_note-102)

- You feel in touch with the Universal Oneness.

  You read a [scroll of remove curse](/wiki/Scroll_of_remove_curse "Scroll of remove curse") while not confused.[\[103\]](#cite_note-103)

- You feel the power of the Force against you!

  As above You read a [scroll of remove curse](/wiki/Scroll_of_remove_curse "Scroll of remove curse") while confused.[\[104\]](#cite_note-104)

- Wow! Modern art.

  You read a [scroll of magic mapping](/wiki/Scroll_of_magic_mapping "Scroll of magic mapping") on a non-mappable level.[\[105\]](#cite_note-105)

- Your mind releases itself from mundane concerns.

  You read a [scroll of amnesia](/wiki/Scroll_of_amnesia "Scroll of amnesia").[\[106\]](#cite_note-106)

* You hear a soda fountain!

  There is a [fountain](/wiki/Fountain "Fountain") on the level.[\[107\]](#cite_note-107)

* You hear dishes being washed!

  There is a [sink](/wiki/Sink "Sink") on the level.[\[108\]](#cite_note-108)

* You hear Queen Beruthiel's cats!

  There is a [throne room](/wiki/Throne_room "Throne room") on the level.[\[109\]](#cite_note-109)

* You hear Donald Duck!

  There is a [swamp](/wiki/Swamp "Swamp") on the level.[\[110\]](#cite_note-110)

* You hear Ebenezer Scrooge!

  There is a [vault](/wiki/Vault "Vault") on the level.[\[111\]](#cite_note-111)

* You hear the quarterback calling the play.

  As above, if the vault is unlooted.[\[112\]](#cite_note-112)

* You hear bees in your \[(nonexistent)] bonnet!

  There is a [beehive](/wiki/Beehive "Beehive") on the level; the word "nonexistent" is added if you are not wearing a [helm](/wiki/Helm "Helm").[\[113\]](#cite_note-113)

* The \<hair> on your \<head> seems to stand up.

  There is a [graveyard](/wiki/Graveyard "Graveyard") on the level.[\[114\]](#cite_note-114)

* You hear General MacArthur!

  There is a populated [barracks](/wiki/Barracks "Barracks") on the level.[\[115\]](#cite_note-115)

* You hear Doctor Doolittle!

  There is a [zoo](/wiki/Zoo "Zoo") on the level.[\[116\]](#cite_note-116)

* You hear Neiman and Marcus arguing!

  There is a [shop](/wiki/Shop "Shop") on the level.[\[117\]](#cite_note-117)

* You hear someone say "No more woodchucks!"  
  You hear a loud ZOT!

  You are on [the Oracle's level](/wiki/Oracle_\(level\) "Oracle (level)").[\[118\]](#cite_note-118)

- Maybe you should find a designated driver.

  You attempted to [ride](/wiki/Ride "Ride") a steed.[\[119\]](#cite_note-119)

- It felt good to get out of the rain.

  You dismounted an unnamed steed.[\[120\]](#cite_note-120)

* You are turning into a \<monster>.

  You were two turns away from becoming a [green slime](/wiki/Green_slime "Green slime").[\[121\]](#cite_note-121)

* You have become a \<monster>.

  You became a [green slime](/wiki/Green_slime "Green slime").[\[122\]](#cite_note-122)

- You trip over your own elbow.  
  You slip on a banana peel.

  You [fumbled](/wiki/Fumbling "Fumbling").[\[123\]](#cite_note-123)[\[124\]](#cite_note-124)

- Egads! They bite your feet!

  You fumbled over an item.[\[125\]](#cite_note-125)

* Batteries have not been invented yet.

  A lit [brass lantern](/wiki/Brass_lantern "Brass lantern") in your inventory just flickered.[\[126\]](#cite_note-126)

* They shriek!

  You saw some [candles](/wiki/Candle "Candle") stop burning.[\[127\]](#cite_note-127)

* You notice a crease in the linoleum.

  You triggered a [squeaky board](/wiki/Squeaky_board "Squeaky board") trap.[\[128\]](#cite_note-128)

* You hear someone bowling.

  You heard a [rolling boulder trap](/wiki/Rolling_boulder_trap "Rolling boulder trap") being set off.[\[129\]](#cite_note-129)

* You hear the moon howling at you.  
  You suddenly yearn for Cleveland.  
  You smell hamburgers.

  You stepped on a [magic trap](/wiki/Magic_trap "Magic trap"). with no effect.[\[130\]](#cite_note-130)[\[131\]](#cite_note-131)[\[132\]](#cite_note-132)

* What a groovy feeling!

  You triggered a [container trap](/wiki/Container_trap "Container trap").[\[133\]](#cite_note-133)

- Up, up, and awaaaay! You're walking on air!

  You begin [levitation](/wiki/Levitation "Levitation").[\[134\]](#cite_note-134)

- Bummer! You've hit the ground.

  You ceased levitating.[\[135\]](#cite_note-135)

- Bummer! You've splashed down.

  You ceased levitating over [water](/wiki/Water "Water") or [lava](/wiki/Lava "Lava").[\[136\]](#cite_note-136)

- Bummer! You've crashed.

  You ceased levitating by falling into a [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") trap.[\[137\]](#cite_note-137)

* You sink like the Titanic.

  You fell into [water](/wiki/Water "Water") without being able to swim.[\[138\]](#cite_note-138)

* Your keel hits the bottom.

  You fell into water while amphibious.[\[139\]](#cite_note-139)

- The floor runs like butter!

  You cast [stone to flesh](/wiki/Stone_to_flesh "Stone to flesh") downward, erasing any stone engravings.[\[140\]](#cite_note-140)

## History

In NetHack 3.3.0 and earlier versions, including some variants based on those versions, the following messages were produced for [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning"):

- You mood ring glows \<color>.

  You are wearing a [ring of warning](/wiki/Ring_of_warning "Ring of warning").[\[141\]](#cite_note-141)

- Your spider-sense is tingling…

  You have intrinsic warning.[\[142\]](#cite_note-142)

### Other unused messages

- You bump into an invisible tree. Ouch!

  You entered a forcefield (deferred feature).[\[143\]](#cite_note-143)

html:
Hallucinatory messages

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

In NetHack, you may encounter some unexpected messages while hallucinating. The following is a comprehensive list of all available hallucinatory messages.

All appearances of "<color>" will be replaced with one of the following| ultraviolet, infrared, bluish-orange, reddish-green, dark white, light black, sky blue-pink, salty, sweet, sour, bitter, striped, spiral, swirly, plaid, checkered, argyle, paisley, blotchy, guernsey-spotted, polka-dotted, square, round, triangular, cabernet, sangria, fuchsia, wisteria, lemon-lime, strawberry-banana, peppermint, romantic, or incandescent. The word "poohbah" also replaces every instance of "priest".[1]

Contents

  • 1 Messages
  • 2 History
    • 2.1 Other unused messages
  • 3 References

Messages

You feel less trippy now.
Your confusion wore off.[2]
You feel less wobbly now.
Your stunning wore off.[3]
Oh, bummer! Everything is dark! Help!
You became blind.[4]
Your vision seems to dim but is happier now.
As above, while wearing the Eyes of the Overworld.[5]
Far out! Everything is all cosmic again!
Your blindness wore off.[6]
Your vision seems to brighten but is sadder now.
As above, while wearing the Eyes of the Overworld.[7]
As you open the bottle, an enormous <monster> emerges!
You quaffed a milky potion and a ghost appeared.[8]
You have a normal feeling for a moment, then it passes.
You quaffed a potion with no net effect, or whenever you would have a strange feeling.[9]
This tastes like [watered down] dandelion wine!
You quaffed a [diluted] potion of booze.[10]
Yecch! This tastes overripe.
You quaffed a cursed potion of fruit juice or potion of see invisible.[11]
This tastes like 10% real [reconstituted] all-natural beverage.
You quaffed a [diluted] non-cursed potion of fruit juice or potion of see invisible.[12]
You are shocked back to your senses!
You quaffed a potion of sickness to end hallucination.[13]
What a trippy feeling!
You quaffed a potion of confusion.[14]
This tastes tangy.
You quaffed a potion of acid while acid resistant.[15]
You feel a little normal.
You quaffed or were hit by a potion of polymorph.[16]
You sense something nearby.
You quaffed a potion of object detection or cast the spell of detect treasure.[17]
You get the heebie jeebies.
You quaffed a potion of monster detection or cast the spell of detect monsters without any monsters on the level, while not a beginner.[18]
You hear a voice say, "It's dead, Jim."
You applied a stethoscope down at a corpse.[19]
You produce a normal whistling sound.
You applied a non-cursed (or cursed, half of the time) magic whistle.[20]
Yow! The mirror stares back!
You applied a mirror to yourself, while polymorphed into a floating eye.[21]
You look <color>.
You applied a mirror to yourself, while not polymorphed into a floating eye, umber hulk, or any V.[22]
You give the fish a chance to fix their makeup.
You applied a mirror in a direction while underwater.[23]
You suddenly feel trippy.
You became confused via a cursed unicorn horn.[24]
Oh, wow, look at the pretty shards.
You destroyed a gem by rubbing it against a cursed touchstone while not blind.[25]
Oh wow, man: Fractals!
As above, with a non-cursed touchstone.
You give yourself a facial.
You applied a cream pie.[26]
Your body takes on a normal transparency…
You invoked an artifact to become invisible, or ate a ring of invisibility.[27] [28]
A normal force teleports you away…
You were killed by a falling drawbridge, but were lifesaved.[29]
<Monster> drinks the <lava/moat> and disappears.
A monster was forced into the moat/lava by the drawbridge and died.[30]
<Monster> gets into some heavy metal!
A monster was killed by a destroyed drawbridge.[31]
All you see is funky <color> haze.
You applied an uncharged crystal ball while not blind.[32]
Whoa! Psychedelic colors, <dude/babe>!
You grok some groovy globs of incandescent lava.
The crystal pulses with sinister <color> light!
You see goldfish swimming above fluorescent rocks.
Oh wow... like a kaleidoscope!
You see tiny snowflakes spinning around a miniature farmhouse.
You successfully applied a charged crystal ball.[33][34][35][36][37][38]
Dude! The living dead!
You dug up a grave, creating a zombie.[39]
I want my mummy!
You dug up a grave, creating a mummy.[40]
There is a <color> flash as <object> hits the altar.
You dropped an object that was either cursed or blessed on an altar.[41]
Whoa! Everything looks different.
You are surrounded by twisty little passages, all alike.
Gee, this looks like uncle Conan's place…
You arrive on a level you forgot due to amnesia.[42]
Whoa! Everything seems different.
Gee, this seems like uncle Conan's place…
As above, while blind.
You feel bummed for a moment.
Your pet starved.[43]
You can't kick something that's in a tizzy!
You attempted to kick something in a pit, spiked pit or web.[44]
You would never recognize it anyway.
You attempted to call a monster something.[45]
My brain hurts!
You put on a dunce cap or helm of opposite alignment.[46]
What a pity - you just ruined a future piece of [fine] art!
You cured yourself of petrification; the message will say "fine art" if your charisma is over 15.[47]
You be chillin'.
You gained fire resistance.[48]
You feel totally together, man.
You gained disintegration resistance.[49]
You feel grounded in reality.
You gained shock resistance.[50]
You feel diffuse.
You gained teleportitis.[51]
You feel centered in your personal space.
You gained teleport control.[52]
You feel in touch with the cosmos.
You gained telepathy.[53]
You tawt you taw a puttie tat!
You lost see invisible.[54]
You can't resist the temptation to mimic an orange.
You ate a mimic corpse.[55]
You suddenly dread being peeled and mimic <race> again.
Your mimicking timeout ended.[56]
You feel rather trippy.
You became confused via eating rotten food.[57]
Oh wow, like, superior, man!
You ate a food ration while hungry or worse.[58]
Tastes great! Less filling!
You ate a tripe ration while an orc.[59]
My, that was a primo <fruit>!
You ate a non-cursed slime mold.[60]
Segmentation fault -- core dumped.
Bus error -- core dumped.
Yo' mama -- core dumped.
You ate an apple or pear.[61][62][63]
This <food> is grody!
You ate a food that would have tasted terrible.[64]
This <food> is gnarly!
You ate a food that would have tasted delicious.[65]
Four out of five dentists agree.
You ate a non-cursed trident.[66]
You are getting the munchies.
You became hungry.[67]
You now have a lesser case of the munchies.
You ate and are now only hungry.[68]
The munchies are interfering with your motor capabilities.
You became weak from hunger.[69]
You still have the munchies.
You ate and are now only weak.[70]
From the murky drain, a hand reaches up… --oops--
One effect of quaffing from a sink[71]
You've fallen, and you can't get up.
You are trapped in a (spiked) pit.[72]
You have an out-of-body experience.
A monster cast touch of death on you.[73]
You feel (trippy/trippier)!
You became confused from a monster spell.[74]
Ouch! You've been slimed!
You were hit by an acid attack.[75]
Whoopsie-daisy!
You killed a quest leader or a quest guardian.[76]
You hear the studio audience applaud!
You killed your pet.[77]
As <monster> opens the bottle, an enormous <monster> emerges!
A ghost generated from a monster quaffing a milky potion.[78]
<monster>'s body takes on a normal transparency.
A monster became invisible.[79]
What a pity - <monster> just ruined a future piece of art!
A monster cured its stoning.[80]
(paranoid delusion)
You viewed a monster that you are warned of via far look.[81]
The <monster> inside the box is dead!
You opened a box containing Schroedinger's Cat.[82]
Far out, man! You can see right through yourself.
You became invisible while you had see invisible.[83]
Far out, man! You can't see yourself.
As above, without see invisible.[84]
There's a tiger in your tank.
Through prayer, you regained lost attribute points.[85]
Looks like you are back in Kansas.
Through prayer, you ended hallucination.[86]
You feel that <god> is bummed.
A god smote you.[87]
You feel that <god> is pleased as punch.
You prayed successfully with a devout alignment record.[88]
You feel that <god> is ticklish.
As above, with strident alignment record.[89]
You feel that <god> is full.
As above, with other levels of positive alignment record.[90]
Your sacrifice sprouts wings and a propeller and roars away!
Your sacrifice puffs up, swelling bigger and bigger, and pops!
Your sacrifice collapses into a cloud of dancing particles and fades away!
You sacrificed.[91][92][93]
You feel homesick.
You attempted to offer the Amulet of Yendor before reaching the Astral Plane.[94]
You realize you have made a boo-boo.
You attempted to offer an unidentified cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor.[95]
<God> seems groovy.
After sacrifice, your god is less angry.[96]
<God> seems cosmic (not a new fact).
After sacrifice, your god is no longer angry.[97]
The gods seem tall.
Your sacrifice did nothing to appease your god's anger.[98]
You realize the gods are not like you and I.
Your sacrifice reduced your prayer timeout, but it is still nonzero.[99]
Overall, there is a smell of fried onions.
Your sacrifice reduced your prayer timeout to zero.[100]
You see crabgrass at your <feet>. A funny thing in a dungeon.
Your sacrifice increased your Luck.[101]
Being so trippy, you screw up…
You read a scroll while confused.[102]
You feel in touch with the Universal Oneness.
You read a scroll of remove curse while not confused.[103]
You feel the power of the Force against you!
As above You read a scroll of remove curse while confused.[104]
Wow! Modern art.
You read a scroll of magic mapping on a non-mappable level.[105]
Your mind releases itself from mundane concerns.
You read a scroll of amnesia.[106]
You hear a soda fountain!
There is a fountain on the level.[107]
You hear dishes being washed!
There is a sink on the level.[108]
You hear Queen Beruthiel's cats!
There is a throne room on the level.[109]
You hear Donald Duck!
There is a swamp on the level.[110]
You hear Ebenezer Scrooge!
There is a vault on the level.[111]
You hear the quarterback calling the play.
As above, if the vault is unlooted.[112]
You hear bees in your [(nonexistent)] bonnet!
There is a beehive on the level; the word "nonexistent" is added if you are not wearing a helm.[113]
The <hair> on your <head> seems to stand up.
There is a graveyard on the level.[114]
You hear General MacArthur!
There is a populated barracks on the level.[115]
You hear Doctor Doolittle!
There is a zoo on the level.[116]
You hear Neiman and Marcus arguing!
There is a shop on the level.[117]
You hear someone say "No more woodchucks!"
You hear a loud ZOT!
You are on the Oracle's level.[118]
Maybe you should find a designated driver.
You attempted to ride a steed.[119]
It felt good to get out of the rain.
You dismounted an unnamed steed.[120]
You are turning into a <monster>.
You were two turns away from becoming a green slime.[121]
You have become a <monster>.
You became a green slime.[122]
You trip over your own elbow.
You slip on a banana peel.
You fumbled.[123][124]
Egads! They bite your feet!
You fumbled over an item.[125]
Batteries have not been invented yet.
A lit brass lantern in your inventory just flickered.[126]
They shriek!
You saw some candles stop burning.[127]
You notice a crease in the linoleum.
You triggered a squeaky board trap.[128]
You hear someone bowling.
You heard a rolling boulder trap being set off.[129]
You hear the moon howling at you.
You suddenly yearn for Cleveland.
You smell hamburgers.
You stepped on a magic trap. with no effect.[130][131][132]
What a groovy feeling!
You triggered a container trap.[133]
Up, up, and awaaaay! You're walking on air!
You begin levitation.[134]
Bummer! You've hit the ground.
You ceased levitating.[135]
Bummer! You've splashed down.
You ceased levitating over water or lava.[136]
Bummer! You've crashed.
You ceased levitating by falling into a Sokoban trap.[137]
You sink like the Titanic.
You fell into water without being able to swim.[138]
Your keel hits the bottom.
You fell into water while amphibious.[139]
The floor runs like butter!
You cast stone to flesh downward, erasing any stone engravings.[140]

History

In NetHack 3.3.0 and earlier versions, including some variants based on those versions, the following messages were produced for warning:

You mood ring glows <color>.
You are wearing a ring of warning.[141]
Your spider-sense is tingling…
You have intrinsic warning.[142]

Other unused messages

You bump into an invisible tree. Ouch!
You entered a forcefield (deferred feature).[143]
